# topLeft

**Instance Property**

The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the quadrilateral.

## Declaration

```swift
var topLeft: NormalizedPoint { get }
```

## Getting the normalized points

- **bottomLeft**: The coordinates of the lower-left corner of the quadrilateral.
- **bottomRight**: The coordinates of the lower-right corner of quadrilateral.
- **topRight**: The coordinates of the upper-right corner of the quadrilateral.
